title: LoL Server are down
body: I start the game in 10 min my LoL client crashed and i was in a ranked game and at the end i become -lp because i was 5 min afk but i had internet but the server was down and yet im not in promo for silver 2 i hope i become my lp back when not i uninstall this game

replies.body:
Was heißt denn nochmal „become“?
Und dann deinstalliere schonmal, Lp gibts nie zurück!
in my game it seems like i was the only one who got kicked out. the game counted as afk since i couldnt reconnect in time. the other 9 were still playing as i came back into the game.
